column12: POWER CONTROL FOR A MOBILE TERMINAL IN A SATELLITE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
POWER CONTROL FOR A MOBILE TERMINAL IN A SATELLITE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
Power control for a mobile terminal in a satellite communication system
Power control for a mobile terminal in a satellite communication system
POWER CONTROL FOR A MOBILE TERMINAL IN A SATELLITE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
Power control for a mobile terminal in a satellite communication system
POWER CONTROL FOR A MOBILE TERMINAL IN A SATELLITE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
column13: A method for controlling the transmit power level of a mobile terminal in a satellite communication system includes both a closed-loop element and an open-loop element. For the closed-loop element, the base station calculates the mobile terminal's power setting based on the strength of the signals received from the mobile terminal. The base station takes into account the propagation delays of the satellite system in determining the mobile terminal's transmit power setting. The open-loop element of the power control method allows the mobile terminal to adjust its own transmit power level from frame to frame based on the strength of the received signals from the base station. The strength of the signal received from the base station in each frame is compared to the strength of the signal received in the previous frame. The transmit power level of the mobile terminal is then adjusted inversely in accordance with variations in the observed signal strength.

LEISTUNGSREGELUNG FÜR EIN MOBILENDGERÄT IN EINEM SATELLITENKOMMUNIKATIONSSYSTEM
Power control for a mobile terminal in a satellite communication system
column13: A method for controlling the transmit power level of a mobile terminal in a satellite communication system includes both a closed-loop element and an open-loop element. For the closed-loop element, the base station calculates the mobile terminal's power setting based on the strength of the signals received from the mobile terminal. The base station takes into account the propagation delays of the satellite system in determining the mobile terminal's transmit power setting. The open-loop element of the power control method allows the mobile terminal to adjust its own transmit power level from frame to frame based on the strength of the received signals from the base station. The strength of the signal received from the base station in each frame is compared to the strength of the signal received in the previous frame. The transmit power level of the mobile terminal is then adjusted inversely in accordance with variations in the observed signal strength.

<B>''PROCESSO DE CONTROLE DE POTêNCIA''<D>. Trata-se de um processo para controle do nível de potência de transmissão de um terminal móvel num sistema de comunicação por satélite incluindo tanto um elemento de enlace fechado quanto um elemento de enlace aberto. Para o elemento de enlace fechado, a estação de base calcula o ajuste de potência do terminal móvel com base na intensidade dos sinais recebidos do terminal móvel. A estação de base leva em conta os retardos de propagação do sistema de satélite para determinação de potência de transmissão do terminal móvel. O elemento de enlace aberto do processo de controle de potência permite que o terminal móvel ajuste seu próprio nível de potência de transmissão de quadro para quadro com base na intensidade dos sinais recebidos da estação de base. A intensidade do sinal recebido da estação de base em cada quadro é comparado com a intensidade do sinal recebido no quadro precedente.O nível de potência de transmissão do terminal móvel é então ajustado inversamente de acordo com variações na intesidade de sinal observada.
